scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build:slides && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:slides: slidev build slides.md --out dist/main && slidev build slides_intro.md --out dist/intro && slidev build slides_oop.md --out dist/oop && slidev build slides_naming.md --out dist/naming && slidev build slides_document.md --out dist/document && slidev build slides_architecture.md --out dist/architecture
